channel.title: Hi i got problems with 508 client
channel.description:
hi guys ;D i got a problem with my 508 client i get this error :
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .
and in my run. bat it says:
@echo off cd files title Viaduktscape client java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game0
whats the prolem :s ?

item.title: Hi i got problems with 508 client
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:5, topic:424965”]Have to tell it where the files are

-classpath DIRECTORY[/quote]

hmm like how ?

Read full topic

@tyb97 wrote:

You don’t even know what the fuck I am talking about, make sure you have all the class files, and that your run is going to the right spot.

item.title: Hi i got problems with 508 client
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

hi guys ;D i got a problem with my 508 client i get this error :

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .

and in my run. bat it says:

@echo off
cd files
title Viaduktscape client
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game0

whats the prolem :s ?

Read full topic
